title: game isnt working help !! error 0xc000012f
body: yesturday i had a message of missing files .dll ,, i tried use hextech repair tool but the problem didnt fixed,, i unistalled the game and reinstalled it, but the same message still appear with error code 0xc000012f

replies.body: It sounds like you may have a failing or missing driver or bad hardware.  Reinstalling could fix corrupted game files, but it's important to also update and repair any drivers too.  I recommend going over each step of the [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to fix this up!  Let me know if you have any questions.
i have the  same  problem  and it s   not  working
i  have  done  that  think  by 4  times  and  it was  nothing  happend

I have the problem also and I am still in a ticket trying to fix it (its been 3days) and I have tried sooooo many things still with nothing to show for it. They're really helpful but this error is tough man!

i have also had teh same thing its saying :

C;/Riot Games\League of Legends|libssL-1_1.dll is wither not designed
to run on windows or it contains an error. Try installing the program 
again using the original installation media or contact your system
administrator or the software vendor for support. Error status 
0xc000012f

that is what my error message is coming up with but everythign else is working fine so i dont know what to so so can i please get some help . <3 Riot
i am now having the same problem, i dont see here that the solution was posted, can i please get some help?
